an10.66:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto magadhesu viharati nalakagamake.
an10.66:1.2: Atha kho samandakani paribbajako yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
an10.66:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho samandakani paribbajako ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an10.66:2.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso, sariputta, imasmim dhammavinaye sukham, kim dukkhan”ti?
an10.66:2.2: “Anabhirati kho, avuso, imasmim dhammavinaye dukkha, abhirati sukha.
an10.66:2.3: Anabhiratiya, avuso, sati idam dukkham patikankham—
an10.66:2.14: Anabhiratiya, avuso, sati idam dukkham patikankham.
an10.66:3.1: Abhiratiya, avuso, sati idam sukham patikankham—
an10.66:3.12: Abhiratiya, avuso, sati idam sukham patikankhan”ti.
